NK036(chi)002:0: rang gnas chen po rgya mtsho ar la gtad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK036(chi)002:1: man ngag brgya bcu bzhi pa /
NK036(chi)002:3: ma h+aa gu pa sa ka ri pa ti n+aa ma /
NK036(chi)002:5: rang gnas chen po rgya mtsho ar la gtad pa zhes bya ba /
NK036(chi)002:6: bcom ldan 'das sgron ma 'dus pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK036(chi)002:7: sangs rgyas rnams kyi nges don spungs pa yi //
NK036(chi)002:8: man ngag nges pa'i rgyud sde grangs mang las //
NK036(chi)002:9: phyi nang gsang ba yongs rdzogs bla na med //
NK036(chi)002:10: nges pa'i snying po yang dag gsal bkod pa'i //
NK036(chi)002:11: lus 'dra mig 'dra snying 'dra'i skor gsum gnad rnams kyi //
NK036(chi)002:12: gags dang bstun pa gsang ba'i yi ge 'di nyid rnam par bkod //
NK036(chi)002:13: gsang ba'i gsang mchog bla na med pa ni //
NK036(chi)002:14: lus dang dbang po yan lag rdzogs pa'i skyes bu 'dra //
NK036(chi)002:15: de nyid gnad du bsnun pa ma yin te //
NK036(chi)002:16: stong gsum kun gyi gnad rnams nges bsdus nas //
NK036(chi)002:17: skal ldan yid ches 'jug ste gsang ba'i gnad //
NK036(chi)002:18: rgya mtsho nyi ma can la brten pa ni //
NK036(chi)002:19: chos nyid rgya cher rang snang rang gsal du //
NK036(chi)002:20: nyi ma'i 'od dang 'dra ba bstan pa'i phyir //
NK036(chi)002:21: lus gnad rtsa yi rgya la mdud 'dril ba //
NK036(chi)002:22: rig pa'i sgron ma snang ba 'od po che //
NK036(chi)002:23: 'di la brtags na nyams su blang ba'i thabs //
NK036(chi)002:24: skyes bu rtsol ba 'bad med ye shes skye //
NK036(chi)002:25: byang chub lam gyi sgron ma'i sna khrid de //
NK036(chi)002:26: skyes bu'i lus gnad dbang po'i rang gnad dang //
NK036(chi)002:27: srid pa chags byed skyed byed dang po las //
NK036(chi)002:28: chu yi rang bzhin 'khor 'das mtshon pa'i phyir //
NK036(chi)002:29: dkar nag phyed ma 'bras zhing gsal ba'i mdangs //
NK036(chi)002:30: nad lus bskyed pa srid pa'i thog mar byung //
NK036(chi)002:31: 'dra ba 'dus pa rlung gi gnad bcas pas //
NK036(chi)002:32: 'di la rten 'byung bzhi yi rnam pa can //
NK036(chi)002:33: dran 'dus la sogs 'khor gsum gyis bskyod nas //
NK036(chi)002:34: lus dang dbang po'i yan lag rdzogs nas ni //
NK036(chi)002:35: srid pa las bskyed dang po'i las 'bras brtags //
NK036(chi)002:36: phra zhing gdangs ma lcags kyi rnam pa can //
NK036(chi)002:37: 'phra 'gyur zlum po g.yu drung dkar nag spyod //
NK036(chi)002:38: bzhi 'dus lnga yi ngo bor 'brel pa ni //
NK036(chi)002:39: til 'brur ri bo nang du 'dzud par snang //
NK036(chi)002:40: dran byed dgus ni snang ba lta bu la //
NK036(chi)002:41: kha dog gsar rdzogs ro rnams 'dus pa'i rtags //
NK036(chi)002:42: dbu ma'i cha la sku yi rnam pa can //
NK036(chi)002:43: 'di dang 'brel nas rtse mo rnam par bkod //
NK036(chi)002:44: bde ba'i gnas te thig le'i rnam pa ni //
NK036(chi)002:45: 'khor 'das dbye bas nyis 'gyur rnam par can //
NK036(chi)002:46: kun rdzob gzugs can don dam thig le ni //
NK036(chi)002:47: sgron ma'i snang ba stong pa nyid 'dus la //
NK036(chi)002:48: don dam gnyis med don rnams 'byung ba'i phyir //
NK036(chi)002:49: dbang po yul la 'char bar byed pa yi //
NK036(chi)002:50: rtse mo nyid de me mar mdangs dang mtshungs //
NK036(chi)002:51: a 'bras dwangs ma dkar nag phyed pa la //
NK036(chi)002:52: kha dog rnams kyi sa bon des mtshon phyir //
NK036(chi)002:53: dmar dang mthing ga dkar dang ljang gu'i spris //
NK036(chi)002:54: ma 'dres so sor gsal zhing yul rnams bsdus //
NK036(chi)002:55: chu yi rnam pa can de thams cad rgyangs nas 'chings //
NK036(chi)002:56: gnyis kyi rang bzhin don dam kun rdzob nyid //
NK036(chi)002:57: rnam pa'i gzugs su smin te rgyal mtshan lta bu'i dbyibs //
NK036(chi)002:58: srid pa'i gzhi ma las 'brel 'khor lo bzhi dang ldan //
NK036(chi)002:59: yul 'dzin rang snang stong pa'i rjes rnams dpyod //
NK036(chi)002:60: chu yi rnam par dbye ba'i rang bzhin 'gyur dag las //
NK036(chi)002:61: skyed brtan sdud khyab 'dzin dang 'chad pa dang //
NK036(chi)002:62: skyong byed yang zhing stong pa'i chos can nyid //
NK036(chi)002:63: de yi phyir na lnga yi mtshan nyid can de de las ni //
NK036(chi)002:64: sna tshogs snang ste kun rdzob gzugs su shar //
NK036(chi)002:65: 'od dang thig le kha dog so sor ma 'dres sar rdzoogs pas //
NK036(chi)002:66: don dam nyid las brjod bya'i gzhir gyur pa'i //
NK036(chi)002:67: kun gyi yid dpyod 'jug pa'i gnas de ngo bo sus mthong med //
NK036(chi)002:68: skyed byed la sogs bzhi yi rim pa nyid las ni //
NK036(chi)002:69: snang bye bzhi ste 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa sdud //
NK036(chi)002:70: de yi phyir na chu ste rgya mtsho'i rang gzugs las //
NK036(chi)002:71: rnam bzhi 'byung bzhi 'char bar byed pa'i nyi ma can //
NK036(chi)002:72: 'gro rnams ma rigs la sogs mun pa sel phyir ro //
NK036(chi)002:73: 'di la ma brten lta spyod sgom 'bras med //
NK036(chi)002:74: de yi phyir na kun gyi 'byung khungs yin pas dri ma dag /
NK036(chi)002:75: sgrib byed med pa'i rnam par sgo gnyis dag pa ni //
NK036(chi)002:76: rlung gnyis me yi rnam pa'i 'gyu byed cha yis rab dbye bas //
NK036(chi)002:77: 'gyu byed cha las phyed btsun rnam par snang ba ni //
NK036(chi)002:78: rlung ste las dang ye shes gnyis su gyur pa yang //
NK036(chi)002:79: sgo gnyis skyed par byed pa'i srid shes nas //
NK036(chi)002:80: rags dang phra rnams 'dzin par byed pa'i las gnyis 'grub //
NK036(chi)002:81: 'chad pa la sogs 'phel rnams 'grub par byed pa'i gnad //
NK036(chi)002:82: 'di la brten nas yul rnams so so'i bye brag la 'jug phyir //
NK036(chi)002:83: kun gyi gnad yin dri ma gang gi shongs pas na //
NK036(chi)002:84: 'di la brten nas yang dag ye shes mngon par 'grub //
NK036(chi)002:85: sangs rgyas nyid kyang mngon sum yul du snang //
NK036(chi)002:86: de yi phyir na gsang ba'i gnad 'di man ngag kun gyi gzhi //
NK036(chi)002:87: lud kyi bcud phur rtsa gnad 'khor lo'i bcud //
NK036(chi)002:88: de dang 'brel byed spyan gnyis 'gag byed rang gsal ba //
NK036(chi)002:89: rtsa yi bcud phur stems dang dkrugs dang btsir ba'i gnad nyid ni //
NK036(chi)002:90: yo ga'i mngon sum yul du rang rig gtan la dbab pa'i phyir //
NK036(chi)002:91: 'di nyid kyang ni mkhas par yang nas yang du'am //
NK036(chi)002:92: bcu de gnad la bor ba yang gsang nges pa'i bcud yin no //
NK036(chi)002:93: snang ba bcud pa rnam pa gnyis las 'di ni yang //
NK036(chi)002:94: rjes mi bcad phyir rang sor bzhag cig rgya mtsho ma bskyod pa //
NK036(chi)002:95: de yi dbang gis lus ngag g.yo phyir med phyir yang //
NK036(chi)002:96: bzhag pa'i sa dang rang bzo mkhas pas shes par bya ste 'di nyid rang //
NK036(chi)002:97: nges pa'i don ma rtog par byed na 'dzin rjes bcud pa'i gnad //
NK036(chi)002:98: nan tan mchog tu 'di ltar nges bsgrub g.yo zhing bskyod pa yang //
NK036(chi)002:99: dal rten grogs kyang longs spyod mi brten par //
NK036(chi)002:100: rab tu dben pa'i sa phyogs yid 'od phun sum tshogs //
NK036(chi)002:101: mi yis rgyu bar dka' ba'i gcan gzan gdug pa'i gnas su ni //
NK036(chi)002:102: bya byed 'brel pa rang sar bcad nas rgya mtsho rtag tu stems //
NK036(chi)002:103: 'di yi rnal 'byor kun gyis gsang chen don rab 'grub //
NK036(chi)002:104: rgya mtsho ar gtad las bcud phud gsum gyis mig gi mtshan nyid gtan la phab pa'o //
NK036(chi)002:105: bram ze'i slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa /
NK036(chi)002:106: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la'i zhal snga nas /
